inclusion.criterion: Patient is, in the investigator's opinion, willing and able to comply with the protocol requirements.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age over 18 and under 67 years old.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient diagnosed with symptomatic Multiple Myeloma based on standard criteria with bad prognosis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient who displayed a Monosomy of chromosome 13 or other adverse cytogenetic abnormality.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient with relapsed multiple myeloma after autologous transplantation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has a ECOG performance status <= 2.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients who are candidates for autologous transplantation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have HLA-identical sibling donors.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient has the following laboratory values before Baseline visit: Platelet count ≥ 30000/mm3 (transfusion allowed), hemoglobin ≥ 8 g/dl (transfusion allowed) and absolute neutrophil count (ANC) ≥ 0.750/mm3.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Aspartate transaminase (AST): ≤ 2.5 x the upper limit of normal. Alanine transaminase (ALT): ): ≤ 2.5 x the upper limit of normal. Total bilirubin: ≤1.5 x the upper limit of normal. Serum creatinine value ≤ 2mg/dl
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient present serious pathologies that make impossible chemotherapy treatments:
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Congestive heart failure, angina or heart attack during last 12 months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled supraventricular arrhythmias during last 3 last months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient has Grade 2 peripheral neuropathy within 14 days before enrollment.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient with serious psychiatric disorders that make impossible comply satisfactorily with the protocol requirements.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 64yo woman with multiple myeloma, s/p allogeneic transplant with recurrent disease and with systemic amyloidosis (involvement of lungs, tongue, bladder, heart), on hemodialysis for ESRD who represents for malaise, weakness, and generalized body aching x 2 days. She was admitted last week with hypercalcemia and treated with pamidronate 30mg, calcitonin, and dialysis.
